resources.string: Connection Could not be made. Try Again
We need 60 minutes to find you the perfect driver!
Oops! Please select a time in the future
All our drivers are currently occupied! Kindly try again later.
Uh-oh, we are not available in your city right now.
Voila! Your booking has been confirmed. You will receive a call confirming the details of your driver within the next 10 minutes.
Night: Base Fare Rs. 250 + Rs. 99/- per hour.
A. We are an on-demand driver service. Our skilled and verified driver comes to your doorsteps and drives your car, while you sit peacefully and enjoy the ride!
Q. What areas is Driverr operational in?
A. We are only Operational in Mumbai and currently provide pick-ups from Lower Parel to Bandra
Q. How much does it cost?
A. Rs. 99/Hr. Flat. (day) Additional charges in the night. After the driver reaches your place, a bonus waiting time of 10 mins is provided. Post that, the service time of the driver is chargeable.
Q. How do I make a payment?
A. Currently at the end of the trip, please pay the Driver by cash.
Q. What if I need to go outstation?
A. Yes, we do serve Drivers for outstation trips. For any special request, please call us at +91-8767343717.
Q. Can I make a night booking?
A. Yes. We are operational 24 hours.
Q. What is the minimum time before a driver comes to my doorstep?
A. We currently require a buffer of 1 hour to serve your requests.
Q. Is there an extra charge for one way trips?
A. Yes. A Rs. 50 extra cost is applicable for one-way trips.
